judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellant to pay costs.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Baebieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Harry R. Kozart, with him Weissman, Kozart d Criden, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Sack v. Feinman, Appellant.
Argued November 8, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Harry R. Kozart, with him Weissman, Kozart d Criden, for appellant.
Fred Lowenschuss, for appellee.
December 20, 1971 :
